NewsArticle.Title: Eulogy: Ceremony
NewsArticle.Content:
The Eulogy: Ceremony
Kalliope writes:
<I>A priest of each member of the Trinity appeared at dawn and began long chants of the tales of their arch-deity.
In Pravat the Grimlok worship Adranuch, their Lady of Gold. In Astrid the Kobolds worship Arpina, their All-Mother. In Mehadi the Mukul worship Matrika, their Goddess of the Sun-heart.<I/>
Kalliope Bard of Undine
